DataElement.preferredName: Abdominal Cavity Ultrasound Imaging Diagnostic Imaging Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to a procedure in which sound waves (called ultrasound) are bounced off tissues and the echoes produce a picture (sonogram) for the portion of the body that lies between the thorax and the pelvis being performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Abdominal Cavity Ultrasound Imaging Diagnostic Imaging Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a procedure in which sound waves (called ultrasound) are bounced off tissues and the echoes produce a picture (sonogram) for the portion of the body that lies between the thorax and the pelvis being performed.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Abdominal Cavity Ultrasound Imaging Diagnostic Imaging
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: That portion of the body that lies between the thorax and the pelvis.:A technique in which high-frequency sound waves are bounced off internal organs and the echo pattern is converted into a 2 dimensional picture of the structures beneath the transducer.:Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: The cavity located between the lungs and pelvis. It contains the lower esophagus, stomach, pancreas, intestines, liver, gallbladder and spleen.
The use of high-frequency sound waves to generate images of the body.
Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.origin: NCIC CRF:National Cancer Institute of Canada Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

DataElement.origin: NCIC CRF:National Cancer Institute of Canada Case Report Form
